sentences.sContent: Gley soils are typical of tundra , meadows, and boggy areas.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gley soils are typical of tundra , meadows, and boggy areas.
sentences.sCn: 该种土壤是苔原、 草地以及沼地所特有的。

synos.tran: [生态]苔原；[地理]冻原；冻土地带

phrases.pCn: 北极冻原；北极苔原；藓苔湿原

remMethod.val: t + undra(看做under， 在…之下) → 在冰雪覆盖之下 → 冻土地带

trans.tranCn: 苔原， 冻原， 冻土地带
trans.tranOther: the large flat areas of land in the north of Russia, Canada etc, where it is very cold and there are no trees
